custom-sql.sql: SELECT DATA.uuid_, DATA.contentSeq, DATA.contentDiv, DATA.title, DATA.resume, DATA.contentFileNm, DATA.advancedStartFileNm, DATA.serviceLanguage, DATA.projectYn, DATA.projectId, DATA.viewCnt, DATA.insertId, DATA.insertDate, DATA.updateId, DATA.updateDate, DATA.version, DATA.openYn, (SELECT user.screenName FROM User_ user WHERE user.userId=DATA.insertId) screenName

FROM( SELECT A.* FROM <isEqual property="isAdmin" propertyValue="false"> ( SELECT A.* FROM EDMED_Content A, EDAUT_UserGroupRoleCustom B where A.contentSeq = B.customId <isNotEmpty property="insertId"> AND B.userId = #insertId# AND B.roleId = #roleId# </isNotEmpty> ) A </isEqual> <isEqual property="isAdmin" propertyValue="true"> EDMED_Content A </isEqual>
<isEqual property="categoryJoin" propertyValue="true"> ,(SELECT * FROM AssetEntry WHERE classNameId = #classNameId#) B ,AssetEntries_AssetCategories C </isEqual>
WHERE 1=1 <isEqual property="categoryJoin" propertyValue="true"> AND A.contentSeq = B.classPK AND B.entryId = C.entryId </isEqual>

<isNotEmpty property="categoryIds"> AND C.categoryId in (#categoryIds#) </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="searchText"> AND ExtractValue(A.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') like '%@@searchText@@%' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="serviceLanguage"> AND A.serviceLanguage LIKE '%@@serviceLanguage@@%' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="contentDivList"> AND A.contentDiv IN (#contentDivList#) </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="contentSeq"> AND A.contentSeq = #contentSeq# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="openYn"> AND A.openYn = #openYn# </isNotEmpty> GROUP BY A.contentSeq ORDER BY insertDate DESC )DATA <isNotEmpty property="begin"> Limit #begin#, #end# </isNotEmpty>
SELECT contentSeq, contentDiv, ExtractValue(title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') as title, ExtractValue(resume, 'root/Resume[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') as resume, version

FROM EDMED_Content WHERE serviceLanguage like '%@@languageId@@%'
<isNotEmpty property="modelSeqList"> AND contentSeq in ( @@modelSeqList@@ ) </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="modelSeqStr"> AND contentSeq = #modelSeqStr# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="contentDiv"> AND contentDiv = #contentDiv# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="openYn"> AND openYn = #openYn# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="searchText"> AND ExtractValue(title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchText@@%' </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="begin"> Limit #begin#, #end# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT A.uuid_, A.contentSeq, A.contentDiv, A.title, A.resume, A.contentFileNm, A.advancedStartFileNm, A.serviceLanguage, A.projectYn, A.projectId, A.viewCnt, A.insertId, A.insertDate, A.updateId, A.updateDate, A.version, A.openYn, B.screenName, B.firstName FROM EDMED_Content A, User_ B WHERE A.insertId = B.userId <isNotEmpty property="contentSeq"> AND A.contentSeq = #contentSeq# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="userId"> AND A.insertId = #userId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="searchText"> AND (ExtractValue(A.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchText@@%' OR B.firstName LIKE '%@@searchText@@%') </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="projectCategoryId"> AND A.projectId = #projectCategoryId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="begin"> Limit #begin#, #end# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM EDMED_Content A, User_ B WHERE A.insertId = B.userId <isNotEmpty property="contentSeq"> AND A.contentSeq = #contentSeq# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="userId"> AND A.insertId = #userId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="searchText"> AND (ExtractValue(A.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchText@@%' OR B.firstName LIKE '%@@searchText@@%') </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="projectCategoryId"> AND A.projectId = #projectCategoryId# </isNotEmpty>
